WEDDING DETAILS

Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, sharing and forgiving.
It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection
and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

YOUR PRESENCE IS FORMALLY REQUESTED

We are so excited to share in this special day in our lives with our family and closest friends. We have waited, and are still waiting, anxiously to be joined together as man and wife. The fact that you are supporting us as we take on this journey means more to us than simple words can say.

DETAILS

  • Date: May 14th, 2016
  • Time: 6pm
  • Dress Code: Formal Dress
  • Venue: Union Road Church of God, Gastonia, NC
